alert.note: Alert for Hartley; Moore (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 25 at 5:58PM CDT until April 25 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... Eastern Hartley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 558 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles south of Hartley, or 17 miles south of Dalhart, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Hartley and Channing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
